characters.story: "LWOH!" the spider's thread commands sharply, creating a web to network and connect!
"CHOH?" she questions curiously, feeling the thread - is this silk fabric or satin cloth?
"RUNG?" the soft thread questions curiously like velvet - is this fluffy down filling?
"DEE!" he commands sharply, using the red thread to conclude the contract and bind the agreement!
The child bends down drooping to pick up her purple crayon that rolled away - violet color!
"FAN?" the pattern questions curiously - why are there numerous threads, so abundant and many?
The thread bends down drooping as the grandmother spins yarn on the wheel - whirling to weave!
The silkworm bends down drooping inside the cocoon, surrounded by threads - waiting to emerge!
"CHAN?" the thread questions curiously as it winds around the bobbin - wrapping and coiling?
"JIH!" she commands sharply, examining the delicate thread work - so refined and exquisite!
"JEE!" he commands sharply, using thread to fasten the sail - connecting and linking it tight!
"NAH!" the tailor commands sharply, letting in the seam allowance with careful thread work - accepting and receiving!
"FEN!" the tangled threads sing cheerfully in disorderly fashion - confused and chaotic!
"SWOH!" the thread sings cheerfully as the fabric shrinks in hot water - contracting like pupils!
"DZUNG!" the manager commands sharply, using threads on the board to sum up and synthesize the overall plan!
"SHEN!" the thread and monkey sing cheerfully - the gentry scholar gentleman in fine silk!
"YWEN?" the thread questions curiously about their reason for meeting - is it cause, fate, or connection?
"SHOO!" the thread commands sharply at the inception of the project - following the clue and beginning!
